title: User Interface Software
description: Concepts, techniques, structures, and strategies for implementation of interactive software. Credit not awarded for both CS 4470 and CS 6456.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 2340 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (CS 3750 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or PSYC 3750 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
